00036       Collection_UI::Collection_UI(Collection_UI *p) {
00037         this -> self = p;
00038 
00039         // load UI widget
00040         this -> widget = LoadUI::loadUI(":/forms/ui/Collection.ui");
00041 
00042         // attach handlers
00043         this -> addHandlers();
00044       }
00045 
00046       Collection_UI::~Collection_UI() {
00047       }
00048 
00049       void Collection_UI::show() {
00050         this -> widget -> show();
00051       }
00052

00054       // Private methods

00057       void Collection_UI::addHandlers() {
00058         connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QDialogButtonBox * > ("closeButton"),
00059             SIGNAL(clicked(QAbstractButton*)), widget, SLOT(close()));
00060 
00061         connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QDialogButtonBox * > ("closeButton"),
00062             SIGNAL(clicked(QAbstractButton*)), this, SLOT(close()));
00063 
00064         // add "Browse" handler
00065         connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QPushButton * > ("browseButton"),
00066             SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(openDialog()));
00067 
00068         // add "Scan" handler
00069         connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QPushButton * > ("scanButton"),
00070             SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(scanCollection()));
00071 
00072         // add "Collection" handler
00073         //    connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QAction * > ("actionCollection"),
00074         //        SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(collectionPreferences()));
00075       }
00076 
00077       void Collection_UI::callDestructor() {
00078         cout << "Destruct" << endl;
00079         delete this -> self;
00080         this -> self = NULL;
00081       }
